title: Genesis Chapter 39 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 39 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did Joseph do in Genesis 39:5?
options: Built an altar to the Lord
Blessed the Egyptian's house for Joseph's sake
questions.correctAnswer: Blessed the Egyptian's house for Joseph's sake

questions.question: According to Genesis 39:2, who was with Joseph?
questions.explanation: Genesis 39:2 states: "And the LORD was with Joseph, and he was a prosperous man; and he was in the house of his master the Egyptian."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 39:3: "And his ______ saw that the LORD was with him, and that the LORD made all that he did to prosper in his hand."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And his master saw that the LORD was with him, and that the LORD made all that he did to prosper in his hand."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 39:7: "And it came to pass after these things, that his master's wife cast her eyes upon ______; and she said, Lie with me."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And it came to pass after these things, that his master's wife cast her eyes upon Joseph; and she said, Lie with me."
